t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 8 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Securing IP rights can be complex and costly, but it’s a necessary step to protect your name, logo, product designs, and other aspects of your brand. If you don’t yet have a trademark, you can enroll in Brand Registry with a pending trademark application filed through Amazon IP Accelerator.

t: Launch your brand with Amazon.in
s: Start your brand’s Amazon.in journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon.in store.
